data.title: No comfortable place to sit
data.text: It may be intentional but there is no place that is comfortable to sit.  They have a long bar with hard metal stools and 2 wooden tables with hard wood chairs.  No soft chairs or couches.  We only stayed about 30 minutes and then ended up at a different brand coffee shop 1/2 a mile away for the rest of the day.

data.title: Best ever coffee
data.text: Starbucks is always a welcoming place for me.  The staff were friendly and efficient.  You can find a Starbucks  to satisfy your craving and this is one I would visit time and time again.

data.title: Great service!!
data.text: We popped in here 30 minutes before closing and the baristas were friendly and willing to help as if they had just opened. I really appreciated the great service even though it was close to closing time.

data.title: Clean and great customers service
data.text: This is a great place to get a quick breakfast and coffee in the morning if you need one at 6am in the morning. Love this place. Just down the street from McCormick Scottsdale.

data.title: Starbucks
data.text: We grabbed a morning coffee and Muffin. Good quick and friendly service. It is the same as every other starbucks!

data.title: Close to the Hilton
data.text: Just down from the Hilton on Indian School Road, this sits on a corner where you can sit and watch the traffic go by. Free wifi of course, usual Starbucks and very popular at 7am.

data.title: Starbucks lover
data.text: Great coffee with great place to sit and lounge. The baristas are really sweet and most of all, get my name correct.

data.title: One on every corner…
data.text: Okay, not quite, but if you are in almost any shopping area (trust me, in Scottsdale there is one of those on every corner) you will find a Starbucks. Quality control seems important -- every Starbucks is about the same. At this point I can't believe this coffee shop even needs a review. The coffee is strong, the frozen drinks are delish, the pastries are okay (I do love the scones). Maybe a little pricey, but you can't go wrong having a treat there.

data.title: Quello che ti aspetti
data.text:
Locale piccolo e ben climatizzato .
Purtroppo aveva i servizi igienici fuori servizio ma l'offerta è quello che ci si aspetta da Starbucks
